Text:
If Alpha's info is correct, the bandits should be
coming to this village...

Aight, time ta head out! Stick to tha plan and stay
hidden!
Yeeeah!

There they are... How kind of them to pinpoint their
location with those lanterns.

Do they really think they're being sneaky? A real
shadowbroker doesn't carry around a light.

Listen up, the head honcho said this village is ours
for the takin'.

Anything of value's gotta be split half-'n-half,
but the food an' the women are yours ta do
as ya please!
Yeeeahh!

They're textbook bad guys. Having a few of them in
the world keeps things interesting.

Let's go! Remember ta set the fires AFTER ya take
yer spoils!

Alright... Let's get started. Hopefully these guys
make it worth my while.
Ulp...!
Guargh!

What the hell?! What's wrong, didja have so much fun
you passed out? Git back on yer feet!

You know, as leader you should always have a bird's-
eye view of the situation.

Wh-Who the hell are you?! Oy, there's some freak
dressed in all black over here!

You don't even understand the beauty of black...
I'm havin' a hard enough time with Baldy so I'm
really not in the mood.
The hell is he talkin' about?! Get 'im, boys!
"Boys"? Where are these "boys" you speak of?
Huh...? Ah...
You lose.
Urgh... Guargh!

Relax, it's called a false swipe. It's useful
for a stereotypical villain like you.

This should be the last of them... That was boring.
Well, at least I left the best for last—

(An aristocrat... The Baron's good-for-nothing son
by day, protecting citizens behind the scenes with
his true power by night... Sounds like a movie plot.)

Hey, why are you ruffians still here?! Did you forget
that it's nearly time for me to chase you out of town?

Keep it down, I'm trying to think here. Hm...?
You must be the crooked Magistrate. You
look like you know which side your bread
is buttered on.

Buttered bread? You're speaking nonsense...
You filthy thieves are all alike!

You must be blind to mistake me for a bandit.
Take a long, hard look.
Wha—?! Who are you?!

Who am I...? Say, for example, someone related to the
person you're trying to steal land from...

Do you always talk so much?! I don't know who your
boss is, but I'm the bigger boss! You listen to me!

(Wow, he didn't hear a word I said...! He's the
perfect cookie-cutter bad guy!)

You might wanna stop and take a look around you,
if those eyes of yours can actually see anything.
Maybe you'll get the hint.

That corpse...isn't a villager? Did you kill these
bandits?
And what if I did?

You just saved me the trouble! I can't let anyone who
knows my secret live!
Which means, you intend to kill me.
Wha—?! He's fast...!

Your plan is a total mess, did you think about
anything beforehand? You should just confess
already.
Huh?!

You're a little smarter than those bandits were.
It'll come back to bite me if I let you live, though,
so it's time to say goodbye.
W-Wait...! Hear me out! I had my reasons!

Oh really? A good reason to despise the Kagenou
family? But it doesn't seem like you're trying to
buy time...
Fine, go ahead. I'll listen for posterity.
Th-The Kagenou family... One of them is possessed!
Oh?

(There it is. Possession. That's a loaded thing to say
in this world. It's enough reason to justify genocide,
like a witch-hunt.)

The Kagenou family line is possessed... They're
society's enemy, a malignant tumor!

If let to live, they will not only bring destruction
to the Kingdom but the surrounding countries
as well!

Uh-huh... So you want to get rid of them and take
their land, right?
W-Well...

The pretense is that the capital controls the land
directly, but in reality it's run by someone who's
familiar with it.

If Baron Kagenou is removed, the next in line...
Is you, isn't it?

I-I'm not acting out of my own self-interest! It's
for the good of the world... Yes, it's a holy war!

Of all the things... A holy war? Okay, sure, got it.
Whatever you say.
I-I'm glad you understand...!

You're a stain on this Kingdom, I'll be doing it
a service by ending you.
Wha—?!

If possession ran in the Kagenou family, I'd be the
first one to know.
Ah...! You, you're the Kagenou—!
Man, you're slow to catch on!

Urk... Gaaah! Who knew the Kagenou family was hiding
such a powerf—guargh!

Well that's that... All I need to do is line the
bodies up in the town square, that should
get the message across.

Then the surviving bandit can run back to his buddies
screaming and crying to let them know. This should
make the town safer.

The Kagenou family is possessed, huh... You don't get
smoke without a fire, so maybe I should dig around...
